sections.description: Configure default behavior for new groups

maxGroups.label: Maximum Groups
maxGroups.description: Maximum number of response groups per guild

maxResponseLength.label: Max Response Length
maxResponseLength.description: Maximum total characters for all responses combined per group

maxPatternsPerGroup.label: Max Patterns Per Group
maxPatternsPerGroup.description: Maximum number of trigger patterns allowed per group

maxResponsesPerGroup.label: Max Responses Per Group
maxResponsesPerGroup.description: Maximum number of responses allowed per group

maxVariablesPerGroup.label: Max Variables Per Group
maxVariablesPerGroup.description: Maximum number of custom variables per group

maxEmbedFieldsPerResponse.label: Max Embed Fields
maxEmbedFieldsPerResponse.description: Maximum embed fields per response (Discord limit: 25)

maxHistoryEntries.label: History Entries
maxHistoryEntries.description: Number of response history entries to keep per guild

trackHistoryByDefault.label: Track History by Default
trackHistoryByDefault.description: Enable history tracking for new groups by default

defaultCooldownMs.label: Default Cooldown (ms)
defaultCooldownMs.description: Default cooldown in milliseconds for new groups (0 = no cooldown)

defaultSelectionMode.label: Default Selection Mode
defaultSelectionMode.description: How responses are selected when multiple are configured

options.label: Random
options.description: Pick a random response each time
